2024920.name: Ghost of Viyk
2024920.description:
First, you have to die. Only then will you be able to free your homeland from evil in this gripping Ukrainian grimfolk roguelite action game. Fight. Die. Rise and rush into immersive real-time combat, to unravel the story of the haunting world of Viyk.

Fast-paced battles, your way


To defeat her orc archenemy, Birdie needs your custom build. Enhance the abilities of your choice, find powerful weapons, equip potent charms, and crush the plagued orc hordes!

Unpredictable plagued enemies


The insidious Black Plague Sect spreads its corruption throughout Viyk. Get ready to uncover their their most hideous secrets and pay a dear price to defeat their cult leader.

Fairytale world, drowning in real blood


In the perilous world of Vyik, Ukrainian folklore intertwines with riveting reality. Encounter characters whose lives were ravaged by war, forge unlikely alliances, meet unexpected foes, and perhaps even discover love amidst the chaos.

Death is just the beginning


In Viyk, death is not the reason to stop: both for you and your ultimate enemy. Prepare to die again in this extensive odyssey with unparalleled replayability — and fight… well, you’ll see for yourself.
